Description: Papyrus fragment bearing 2 lines of Coptic text on one side written along the fibres (recto), 2 lines and parts of 2 more written on the other against the fibres (verso). Mounted with EA 75306, 75305, 75304, 75303, 75302.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118109) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118109)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Bawit Clackson 83; P.Bawit Clackson 67
